prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Uranium Glass Garden Gnomes are a new product available in the eshop. These decorative items are made from glass that contains fluorescent uranium oxide, giving them unique properties.

promptResult.content: Uranium Glass, Garden Gnomes, eshop, decorative items, fluorescent, uranium oxide
